summary: This module implements descriptor classes that power attribute access to related model instances in Django’s ORM. It provides forward and reverse descriptors for many‑to‑one, one‑to‑one, and many‑to‑many relationships, handling lazy loading, caching, query construction, and manager generation so that related objects can be accessed and manipulated through natural attribute syntax.
business_intent: To abstract the complexities of database joins and relationship handling, allowing developers to retrieve, assign, and manage related model objects transparently via Python attributes, thereby simplifying code that works with foreign keys, one‑to‑one links, and many‑to‑many links.
